# Harhalakis et al.(1994)
# m = 17 p = 20
# Instance format:
# machines_number parts_number
# machine1 part_to_be_processed_1 part_to_be_processed_2 ...
# machine2 part_to_be_processed_1 part_to_be_processed_2 ...
# ...

17 20

2 1 10 15 19
3 3 6 9 12 14 18 20
4 4 5 11 13 16

6 2 8 17
7 6 9 12 18 20
8 1 7 10 15 19
9 4 11 13 16 
10 4 5 13 16
11 2 3 8 14 18

13 1 7 10 15 19

17 2 8 17
